medicaltest

Class XRayScanFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • medicaltest.MedicalTestFactory
      • medicaltest.XRayScanFactory

  • public class XRayScanFactory
extends MedicalTestFactory
    The Factory that creates an XRayScan This factory requires : A bodypart, a zoomlevel and the number of needed images.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MedicalTest create()
      Creates a medicaltest given that the factory is sufficiently initialized.
      void numberOfNeededImages(int num)
      Sets the number of images that is required for this Xray scan
      void setBodyPart(java.lang.String bodypart)
      Sets the bodypart the scan is used for ( in the form of a string), this argument can not be null.
      void setZoomLevel(float zoomlevel)
      Sets the zoomlevel used for Xray scan.
